entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning on integer divisions #72833
  • overload resolution behavior with implicitly-typed `new` and delegates #72831
  • Cannot close the rename variables dialog #72830
  • "Remove redundant assignment" removes unrelated code #72829

Closed

  • [Question] How to use functionality from nuget packages in project referenced source generator #72356
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown when compiling optional generic partial methods (no modifier) #72431
  • [Bug]: Overriding a member loses nullability analysis from base class #71740
  • [VB] String comparison with string constants can be optimized to either of `String.Equals` (`String.op_Equality`, `op_Inequality`), `String.IsNullOrEmpty`, or `String.CompareOrdinal` #71835
  • [VB] Use `String.Concat` for interpolated strings if possible like C# #71839
  • Avoid unnecessary InvalidCastException for VB.NET #72547
  • Inconsistent dispose behavior between `await using` and `await foreach` #72573
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Move source-generators out of ProjectState and entirely into SolutinoCompilationState #72834
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2419527 #72832
    auto-merge
  • Remove legacy TS EA api #72828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (#72273)" #72827
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823

Merged

  • Move code that retrieves source generators to running in OOP only #72825
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Further diagnostics-subsystem cleanup #72826
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reapply "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'synchronize with build' internal functionality #72802
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.11
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • Remove ServiceHub config for desktop host #72793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.11
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Print diagnostics in invariant culture (English error messages) in assert text #72816
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
